pos_mean_info_list.mean: 可避免的；可作为无效的；可回避的

word_mean_info__list.difference: 侧重有意识地躲避开要冒险或有危险的事物或情况。
多指避开实际的威胁，暗示威胁或危险正在迫近。

word_group.brief_definition: 以避免；为了避免；来避免
避免使用暴力；避免暴力行为

bilingual.source: Try to avoid drinking too much tea or coffee.
bilingual.target: 尽量避免喝太多茶或咖啡。

bilingual.source: I always leave the house early to avoid heavy traffic.
bilingual.target: 我总是早早出门以避免交通拥堵。

bilingual.source: And we should avoid making any noise in the background.
bilingual.target: 我们应该避免在背景中发出任何噪音。

bilingual.source: My husband and I avoid all products that come from animals.
bilingual.target: 我和我丈夫避免食用所有动物制品。

bilingual.source: Try to think how you and your family can avoid wasting water.
bilingual.target: 试着想想你和你的家人如何避免浪费水。

bilingual.source: Many big cities have given up this custom in order to avoid air pollution.
bilingual.target: 许多大城市为了避免空气污染已经放弃了这个习俗。

bilingual.source: He realized that Americans can hardly avoid buying products made in China.
bilingual.target: 他意识到美国人几乎无法避免购买中国制造的产品。

bilingual.source: Students should also track time spent on their phones and avoid using them too much.
bilingual.target: 学生还应跟踪使用手机的时间，避免过度使用。

bilingual.source: Now that it's hard to avoid a disaster on Earth, perhaps I should start thinking about moving to space.
bilingual.target: 既然在地球上难以避免灾难，也许我应该开始考虑搬到太空。

list.abstract: avoid是一个英语单词，可以用作及物动词，可以翻译为避开、避免，等等。

yingyinNormal.en: We avoid a government shutdown and the White House gets credit.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们避免了政府关门，而功劳归白宫。

yingyinNormal.en: So let me tell you how to best avoid winding up just another dead-alive prick.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那么就让我告诉你怎样避免被打得满地找牙。

yingyinNormal.en: Lyle Pollard? I withdrew from that case to avoid suborning perjury.
yingyinNormal.zh: 莱尔·波拉德呢？我退出那案子是为了避免被唆使做伪证。

yingyinNormal.en: And did my best to avoid the speccy-spotty fate that Helen had predicted for me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 尽力避免海伦预言的成为青春痘四眼妹的命运。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I was hoping to avoid this. But I might as well get it over with.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好吧，我一直想避免这么做，但我想还是勉为其难一下吧。

yingyinNormal.en: That's what we want to avoid. That's why we do it live, so we keep that energy flowing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一定要避免此类事件，所以要查看火线，保证供电通畅。

yingyinNormal.en: Garrett's expertise in roosters was the cornerstone of our plan to avoid contact with Juli Baker.
yingyinNormal.zh: 加利特是公鸡专家，他能让我避免直接和朱莉·贝克对峙。

yingyinNormal.en: So to avoid the misery of unemployment, the government should instead spend money to create jobs.
yingyinNormal.zh: 因此为了避免失业带来的伤痛，政府增加支出来创造工作机会。

yingyinNormal.en: Before your speech, avoid large meals and dairy products which will make you feel like you need to clear your throat incessantly.
yingyinNormal.zh: 演讲前，避免吃过多食物或是奶制品这些会让你一直想清喉咙
yingyinNormal.videoNameZh: 《公开场合演讲如何展现自信？》

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Stark would like to avoid the possibility of another public incident, until the Accords are of a more secured foundation.
yingyinNormal.zh: 斯塔克先生想避免再发生公开事故，直到《协议》基本尘埃落定。

yingyinNormal.en: Use an amount ending in 8, which is particularly lucky in Chinese culture, and avoid the number 4.
yingyinNormal.zh: 数字必须以8结尾，这在中国的文化中被看作是非常幸运的，同时要避免使用4这个数字。

yingyinNormal.en: We can't stop our movement down this river, and we can't avoid the encounters. We can only approach them in the best possible way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们身在时间之河上停不下来，也无法避免问题。我们只能选择最好的处理办法。

yingyinNormal.en: You know what? If they're gonna shorten it, they should call it the "Muse," you know? Short for "museum" and avoid all the confusion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果他们要用简称，应该把它叫做“博物”，你知道吗？博物馆的简称，避免混淆。

yingyinNormal.en: To meet a threat like this, we have to be smart. We have to use our power wisely. And we have to avoid the mistakes of the past.
yingyinNormal.zh: 为达到这一目标，我们需要精心策划，科学使用武装力量。同时要避免犯以前犯过的错误。

yingyinNormal.en: I believe she's experiencing her menses. Actually, I'm not. In order to avoid surprises, I wear them all the time. Aha. Okay.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我认为她正在经期当中，实际上，还没到时候，但为了避免意外，我得时刻带着卫生巾。理解。非常了解。

yingyinNormal.en: To go to Jewish heaven? Jews don't have heaven. Then to avoid Jewish hell? Have you met my mother? I live in Jewish hell.
yingyinNormal.zh: 死后好上犹太天堂吗？犹太人没有天堂。那是为了避免下犹太地狱吗？你见过我妈吗吧？我不住地狱，谁算住地狱。

yingyinNormal.en: I can't tell you which path in life is best for you, because I don't know how important it is for you to achieve big goals relative to how important it is for you to avoid the pains required to get them.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我无法说出生活中哪条路最适合你，因为我不知道对于你相对于达成目标中避免辛苦，达成重大目标有多重要。

yingyinNormal.en: Keep busy, but avoid unnecessary exertion.
yingyinNormal.zh: 找点事做，但不要耗费过多精力。

yingyinNormal.en: I wanted to avoid dying, if at all possible.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有可能的话，我想尽量别死。

yingyinNormal.en: The Internet's so negative. I try to avoid it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 互联网阴暗负面，我尽量不看呢。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 逃避；避免；废止；职位空缺

word_family.mean: v. 回避；避免做；撤销；废止；使无效；防止；避开

sense_info_list.en: prevent the occurrence of; prevent from happening

examination_example.sentence: Negative consequences of new tech can be <highlight>avoided</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 新技术的负面后果是可以避免的。

examination_example.sentence: A long struggle will be needed to <highlight>avoid</highlight> a future of digital feudalism.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要避免数字封建主义的未来，需要进行长期的斗争。

examination_example.sentence: Rather officials must <highlight>avoid</highlight> double standards, or different types of access for average people and the wealthy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 相反，官员们必须避免双重标准，或者区别对待普通人和富人。

sense_info_list.en: stay away from a person, place, situation, foods, or others

examination_example.sentence: This was also found in high-functioning men with some autistic spectrum symptoms, who may tend to <highlight>avoid</highlight> eye contact.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这也在一些有自闭症谱系症状的高功能男性中发现，他们可能倾向于避开目光接触。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>avoid</highlight> this uneasiness, we turn to our phones.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了躲避这种不安，我们求助于手机。

examination_example.sentence: Managers admire it but <highlight>avoid</highlight> it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 经理们赞赏它，但却避开它。

word_usage.usage: avoid为及物动词，其后可加名词、代词或者doing的形式，即avoid doing sth.，如：to avoid soil being washed away 避免土壤被冲走。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 通常是有意识、成功地避开有害或不愉快的东西。
比avoid意思更强烈，一般指避免重大事故。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 不可避免的；无法回避的；必然的
adj. 可作为无效的；可回避的；能避免的；可避免的
n. 逃避；避免；废止；职位空缺

word_family.mean: v. 回避；避免做；撤销；废止；使无效；防止；避开

sense_info_list.en: prevent the occurrence of; prevent from happening

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Avoid</highlight> going over the same options repeatedly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 避免重复讨论相同的选项。

examination_example.sentence: They want to <highlight>avoid</highlight> unnecessary losses.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们希望避免不必要的损失。

examination_example.sentence: Her father, Robin Williams, who died in 2014, was keen to <highlight>avoid</highlight> the same fate.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她的父亲Robin Williams斯于2014年去世，他渴望避免同样的命运。

sense_info_list.en: stay away from a person, place, situation, foods, or others

examination_example.sentence: Traffic jams often appear where no one has enough information to <highlight>avoid</highlight> them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 交通堵塞经常出现，没有人有足够的信息来避开他们。

sample.mean: v. 使屈辱；使降低身份
adj. 嗡嗡响的；嘈杂的
adj. 漂浮在水上的；不沉的；在船（或艇）上的；摆脱债务；在流传中；当前；有偿债能力的；经济上周转自如的

word_usage.usage:
avoid后接动词必须是动名词形式，即avoid doing sth.，不可以接动词不定式。
示例：他们都避免提及那名字。
误 They all avoid to mention that name.
正 They all avoid mentioning that name.

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 侧重有意识地躲避开要冒险或有危险的事物或情况。
多指避开实际的威胁, 暗示威胁或危险正在迫近。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 逃避；避免；废止；职位空缺

word_family.mean: v. 回避；避免做；撤销；废止；使无效；防止；避开

sense_info_list.en: prevent the occurrence of; prevent from happening

examination_example.sentence: This is based on higher earnings and <highlight>avoided</highlight> costs in health care, crime, welfare dependence and other things.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是基于更高的收入和避免的医疗保健、犯罪、福利依赖和其他方面的成本。

examination_example.sentence: The transport minister advised people in parts of Scotland covered by the orange alert to <highlight>avoid</highlight> travel on Wednesday.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 交通部长建议出现橙色警报的苏格兰部分地区的居民周三避免出行。

examination_example.sentence: Other golden rules counsel us to master ourselves, to <highlight>avoid</highlight> excess and not to be a prosperous (发迹的) fool.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 其他金科玉律建议我们掌握自己，避免过度，不要成为一个富有的傻瓜。

sense_info_list.en: stay away from a person; place; situation; foods; or others

examination_example.sentence: Humble people do not ignore, <highlight>avoid</highlight>, or try to deny their limits or deficiencies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 谦虚的人不会忽视、逃避或试图否认自己的缺点和不足。

examination_example.sentence: It should be <highlight>avoided</highlight> if possible.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果可能的话应该避免(这样的事)。

examination_example.sentence: A reasonable assumption—don't families struggle to <highlight>avoid</highlight> nursing homes and suffer real guilt if they can't?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一个合理的假设——难道家庭不是在努力避免疗养院吗？如果无法避免，难道不是会遭受真正的负罪感吗？

示例：他们都避免提及那名字。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 侧重有意识地躲避开要冒险或有危险的事物或情况。
多指避开实际的威胁，暗示威胁或危险正在迫近。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: prevent the occurrence of; prevent from happening

examination_example.sentence: That way, you will <highlight>avoid</highlight> potential time delays in getting to your classes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样，你就可以避免上课时间可能延迟。

examination_example.sentence: When you want to <highlight>avoid</highlight> interruptions at work, there are several ways to handle things.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你想避免工作被打断，有几种方法可以解决。

examination_example.sentence: This often results in people <highlight>avoiding</highlight> any potentially challenging driving conditions and losing confidence in their driving skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这往往会导致人们避免任何可能具有挑战性的驾驶条件，并对自己的驾驶技术失去信心。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: prevent the occurrence of; prevent from happening

examination_example.sentence: Many road accidents can be <highlight>avoided</highlight> if we all follow traffic rules.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果我们都遵守交通规则，许多交通事故是可以避免的。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>avoid</highlight> toothache, they had their teeth pulled out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了避免牙痛，他们把牙齿拔掉了。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Avoid</highlight> touching your eyes, nose and mouth before washing your hands.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 洗手前避免触摸眼睛、鼻子和嘴巴。

sense_info_list.en: stay away from a person, place, situation, foods, or others

examination_example.sentence: They can stay alive because they run fast to <highlight>avoid</highlight> lions and other enemies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们能活下来是因为它们跑得很快避开了狮子和其他敌人。

examination_example.sentence: But Japanese, African, and many Latin American cultures <highlight>avoid</highlight> eye contact to show respect.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但在日本、非洲和许多拉丁美洲文化中，为表示尊重会避免眼神交流。

examination_example.sentence: When talking to British people, we should <highlight>avoid</highlight> subjects like age, weight or money.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 和英国人交谈时，我们应该避开年龄、体重或金钱等话题。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese:
表示状态转变的前缀, 一般与adj连用, 构成表语形容词。
表示处于某种状态 "…的"。

word_usage.usage:
avoid后接动词必须是动名词形式，即avoid doing sth.，不可以接动词不定式。
示例：他们都避免提及那名字。
误 They all avoid to mention that name.
正 They all avoid mentioning that name.
